Name: Gum Gum Fruit
Description: Permanently turns your body into rubber giving you the ability to stretch at will

Name: Chop Chop Fruit
Description: Allows your body to be able to split apart into pieces and control the said pieces however you wish, making you immune to slashing attacks

Name: Plume Plume Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into smoke at will

Name: Smooth Smooth Fruit
Description: Makes your body smooth and slippery, which in turn makes most attacks and objects slide off your body

Name: Kilo Kilo Fruit
Description: Allows you to change your mass from 1kg to 10,000 kg

Name: Bomb Bomb Fruit
Description: Allows you to make any part of your body explode

Name: Flower Flower Fruit
Description: Allows you to sprout multiple body parts on almost any surface, including your own body, and then manipulate said body parts remotely, as if they were an extension of your own original limbs.

Name: Wax Wax Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control large amounts of wax with the capability to form solid objects

Name: Sand Sand Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into sand at will

Name: Munch Munch Fruit
Description: Allows you to eat anything and gain the properties of whatever you eat

Name: Ox Ox Fruit - Model: Bison
Japanese_Name: Ushi Ushi no mi - Model: Bison
Description: Allows you to transform into a Bison

Name: Human Human Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into a human

Name: Clone Clone Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn yourself into a physical double of anyone you touch

Name: Flame Flame Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into fire at will

Name: Dice Dice Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn any part of your body into blades

Name: Bird Bird Fruit - Model: Falcon
Japanese_Name: Tori Tori no mi - Model: Falcon
Description: Allows you to transform into a Falcon

Name: Dog Dog Fruit - Model: Dachshund
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no mi - Model: Dachshund
Description: Allows you to transform into a Dachshund

Name: Mole Mole Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into a Mole

Name: Spike Spike Fruit
Description: Allows you to grow spikes on any part of your body, and turn any body part entirely into a spike

Name: Dog Dog Fruit - Model: Jackal
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no mi - Model: Jackal
Description: Allows you to transform into a Jackal

Name: Bind Bind Fruit
Description: Allows you to bind their foes in iron shackles created by your body

Name: Spring Spring Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn your limbs into powerful springs

Name: String String Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and manipulate strings

Name: Horse Horse Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into a Horse

Name: Rumble Rumble Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into lightning at will

Name: Slow Slow Fruit
Description: Allows you to emit beams which temporarily slow down your target

Name: Ice Ice Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into ice at will

Name: Door Door Fruit
Description: Allows you to create doors through anything you touch

Name: Cat Cat Fruit - Model: Leopard
Japanese_Name: Neko Neko no mi - Model: Leopard
Description: Allows you to transform into a Leopard

Name: Eleph Eleph Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into an Elephant

Name: Dog Dog Fruit - Model: Wolf
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no mi - Model: Wolf
Description: Allows you to transform into a Wolf

Name: Ox Ox Fruit - Model: Giraffe
Japanese_Name: Ushi Ushi no mi - Model: Giraffe
Description: Allows you to transform into a Giraffe

Name: Bubble Bubble Fruit
Description: Allows to to create and control soap bubbles

Name: Berry Berry Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform your body parts into a multitude of berry-like balls

Name: Rust Rust Fruit
Description: Allows you to cause metallic items to rust and break

Name: Wheel Wheel Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform your arms, feet, and body into wheels

Name: Dark Dark Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into darkness at will

Name: Revive Revive Fruit
Description: Allows the user to be resurrected after their first death

Name: Hollow Hollow Fruit
Description: Allows you to conjure ghosts and turn into a ghost

Name: Shadow Shadow Fruit
Description: Allows you to control shadows

Name: Clear Clear Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn invisible

Name: Paw Paw Fruit
Description: Allows you to repel anything via paws permanently manifested on your palms

Name: Magnet Magnet Fruit
Description: Allows you to create magnetic forces and use them to control metal

Name: Op Op Fruit
Description: Allows you to manipulate anything within a specific area

Name: Glint Glint Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into light at will

Name: Age Age Fruit
Description: Allows you to freely manipulate the age of yourself and others

Name: Castle Castle Fruit
Description: Allows you to become a living fortress

Name: Muscle Muscle Fruit
Description: Allows you to change the size and strength of your muscles

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit - Model: Allosaurus
Description: Allows you to transform into an Allosaurus

Name: Straw Straw Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and manipulate straw at will, with the straw having damage-redirecting properties.

Name: Tone Tone Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn parts of your body into musical instruments and affect the world around you with the music you play

Name: Love Love Fruit
Description: Allows you to use a range of attacks which use emotions of love, lust or adoration to transform opponents into stone

Name: Snake Snake Fruit - Model: Anaconda
Japanese_Name: Hebi Hebi no mi - Model: Anaconda
Description: Allows you to transform into an Anaconda

Name: Snake Snake Fruit - Model: King Cobra
Japanese_Name: Hebi Hebi no mi - Model: King Cobra
Description: Allows you to transform into a King Cobra

Name: Venom Venom Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and be immune to poison

Name: Float Float Fruit
Description: Allows you to cause yourself, others, and objects to float

Name: Horm Horm Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control hormones

Name: Snip Snip Fruit
Description: Allows you to cut and mould anything as if it were paper

Name: Wing Wing Fruit
Description: Allows you to sprout wings

Name: Tremor Tremor Fruit
Description: Allows you to create violent earthquakes

Name: Dog Dog Fruit - Model: Dalmatian
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no mi - Model: Dalmatian
Description: Allows you to transform into a Dalmatian

Name: Twinkle Twinkle Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn any part of your body into indestructable diamond at will

Name: Bug Bug Fruit - Model: Caterpillar
Japanese_Name: Mushi Mushi no mi - Model: Caterpillar
Description: Allows you to transform into a Caterpillar

Name: Bird Bird Fruit - Model: Phoenix
Japanese_Name: Tori Tori no mi - Model: Phoenix
Description: Allows you to transform any part of your your body into Phoenix flames

Name: Pocket Pocket Fruit
Description: Allows you to create pockets on your body

Name: Mag Mag Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into magma at will

Name: Wash Wash Fruit
Description: Allows you to literally wash and hang out to dry people and objects as if they were clothes

Name: Spider Spider Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into a Spider

Name: Human Human Fruit - Model: Buddha
Japanese_Name: Hito Hito no mi - Model: Buddha
Description: Allows you to transform into a Buddha

Name: Huge Huge Fruit
Description: Allows you to grow giant

Name: Swamp Swamp Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into mud at will

Name: Mark Mark Fruit
Description: Allows you to mark someone by touching them and throw something at them with 100% accuracy

Name: Soul Soul Fruit
Description: Allows you to manipulate the lifeforce of yourself and others and embew it into inanimate objects

Name: Turtle Turtle Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform into a Turtle

Name: Egg Egg Fruit
Description: Turns your body composition into that of an egg, which if cracked open will cause you to regenerate into a stronger body that features more and more chicken-like features each time.

Name: Gas Gas Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into gas at will

Name: Garb Garb Fruit
Description: Allows you to create clothing and other apparel out of leaves or stones by visualizing them.

Name: Sala-Sala Fruit, Model: Axolotl
Japanese_Name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl
Description: Allows you to transform into an axolotl

Name: Snow Snow Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into snow at will

Name: Arms Arms Fruit
Description: Gives you the ability to change their body parts into any weapon

Name: Spin Spin Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform any part of your body or piece of worn clothing into propellers capable of rotation at high speed

Name: Stick Stick Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control mucus

Name: Hobby Hobby Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform living people into toys, and erase memories of their existence from others

Name: Press Press Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and manipulate gravitational forces

Name: Barrier Barrier Fruit
Description: Allows you to generate barriers

Name: Stitch Stitch Fruit
Description: Allows you to stitch things together and un-stitch them like if nothing had happened

Name: Glare Glare Fruit
Description: Allows you to see through everything and read the minds of others

Name: Art Art Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn people or objects into abstract art

Name: Jacket Jacket Fruit
Description: Allows you to become a jacket and be worn by others

Name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Rhinoceros Beetle
Japanese_Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi
Description: Allows you to transform into a rhinoceros beetle

Name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Hornet
Japanese_Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi
Description: Allows you to turn into a hornet

Name: Pop Pop Fruit
Description: Allows you to cause your own body or any inorganic object you touch to rupture and explode

Name: Swim Swim Fruit
Description: Allows you to swim in the ground or walls

Name: Ton Ton Fruit
Description: Allows you to increase their weight to 10,000 tons or down to 0

Name: Ripple Ripple Fruit
Description: Allows you to make your body and any object you touch become flat and flexible, letting solid objects ripple, billow, and flutter like a piece of cloth or a flag

Name: Stone Stone Fruit
Description: Allows you to merge with and manipulate stone

Name: Brush Brush Fruit
Description: Allows you to generate ink from your body and use a painting brush to turn images created with that ink into three-dimensional, lifelike objects

Name: Calm Calm Fruit
Description: Allows you to create a soundproof field and to cancel all noises

Name: Heal Heal Fruit
Description: Allows you to heal any wound or injury through the use of liquid that comes from the user's body, such as tears

Name: Eleph-Eleph Fruit, Model: Mammoth
Japanese_Name: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
Description: Allows you to transform into a mammoth

Name: Scroll Scroll Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control scrolls at will, which have special properties including storing objects and generating drawings

Name: Butter Butter Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control butter

Name: Mirror Mirror Fruit
Description: Allows you to create mirrors which can reflect attacks or appearances

Name: Lick Lick Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and manipulate candy at will

Name: Bis Bis Fruit
Description: Allows you to generate and manipulate biscuits at will

Name: Book Book Fruit
Description: Allows you to manipulate books and control pocket dimensions within them

Name: Cream Cream Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and manipulate cream at will

Name: Wring Wring Fruit
Description: Allows you to drain liquid from both living and non-living things by wringing them, as well as absorb liquid into yourself and your weapons

Name: Memo Memo Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn people's memories into strips of film and manipulate them

Name: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Albatross
Japanese_Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
Description: Allows you to transform into an albatross

Name: Mochi Mochi Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into mochi

Name: Puff Puff Fruit
Description: Allows you to summon a genie from your body

Name: Heat Heat Fruit
Description: Allows you to emanate heat from your body

Name: Cook Cook Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn objects into food

Name: Pile Pile Fruit
Description: Allows you to merge themselves with other people

Name: Pump Pump Fruit
Description: Allows you to encourage and rally other people to awaken their latent potential to fight

Name: Push Push Fruit
Description: Allows you to freely move and shape the ground as though it was malleable like clay

Name: Soot Soot Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into soot at will

Name: Millet Millet Fruit
Description: Allows you to create 'dango' from their cheeks that can tame animals and those of part-animal nature

Name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Tanuki
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki
Description: Allows you to transform into a tanuki

Name: Time Time Fruit
Description: Allows you to send yourself and others forward in time

Name: Fish Fish Fruit, Model: Azure Dragon
Japanese_Name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
Description: Allows you to transform into a hybrid and full Azure Dragon at will

Name: Ripe Ripe Fruit
Description: Allows you to mature and decay anything you touch

Name: Dog Dog Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune
Description: Allows you to transform into a nine-tailed fox which grants you the power of illusion

Name: Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Yamata no Orochi
Japanese_Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi
Description: Allows you to transform into a hybrid and full version of the Yamata no Orochi, an eight-headed snake or dragon in Japanese mythology

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit, Model: Spinosaurus
Japanese_Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus
Description: Allows you to transform into a spinosaurus

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit, Model: Pteranodon
Japanese_Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon
Description: Allows you to transform into a pteranodon

Name: Human Human Fruit, Model: Onyudo
Japanese_Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo
Description: Allows you to transform into an onyudo, a large monk yokai

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit, Model: Brachiosaurus
Japanese_Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus
Description: Allows you to transform into a brachiosaurus

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit, Model: Pachycephalosaurus
Japanese_Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus
Description: Allows you to transform into a pachycephalosaurus

Name: Dog Dog Fruit, Model: Okuchi no Makami
Japanese_Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami
Description: Allows you to transform into a hybrid and full version of an ancient wolf deity at will

Name: Dragon Dragon Fruit, Model: Triceratops
Japanese_Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops
Description: Allows you to transform into a triceratops

Name: Spider Spider Fruit, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli
Japanese_Name: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli
Description: Allows you to transform into a hybrid and full version of a Rosamygale grauvogeli, an ancient species of spider

Name: Cat Cat Fruit, Model: Saber Tiger
Japanese_Name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger
Description: Allows you to transform into a saber-toothed tiger

Name: Woods Woods Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into flora at will

Name: Sick Sick Fruit
Description: Allows you to afflict others with diseases

Name: Warp Warp Fruit
Description: Allows you to teleport yourself and others from place to place

Name: Strong Strong Fruit
Description: Grants you increadible strength

Name: Horse Horse Fruit, Model: Pegasus
Japanese_Name: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus
Description: Allows you to transform into a pegasus

Name: Brain Brain Fruit
Description: Allows your brain to expand indefinitely with new knowledge

Name: Island Island Fruit
Description: Allows you to merge with an island's environment and manipulate it

Name: Glug Glug Fruit
Description: Allows you to drink a lot

Name: Glorp Glorp Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control clay

Name: Whip Whip Fruit
Description: Allows you to use whips to command anything you hit

Name: Bat Bat Fruit, Model: Vampire
Japanese_Name: Batto Batto no Mi, Model: Vampire
Description: Allows you to turn into a vampire

Name: Viso Viso Fruit
Description: Allows you to 'phantomize', or create illusory images, of any picture you touches

Name: Clank Clank Fruit
Description: Allows you to telekinetically disassemble objects and reassemble them into whatever you please

Name: Gol Gol Fruit
Description: Allows you to telekinetically manipulate gold at will

Name: Character Character Fruit
Description: Allows you provide consciousness to non-living souls, as well as allowing your soul to merge with others

Name: Paper Paper Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into pieces of paper at will

Name: You You Fruit
Description: Allows you to transform other people into clones of yourself

Name: Bird Bird Fruit, Model: Nue
Japanese_Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Nue
Description: Allows you to transform into a Nue

Name: Sing Sing Fruit
Description: Allows you to teleport people's consciousnesses into a virtual space by singing in which you are all powerful
